descriptor.name: NIVEA Soft Light Moisturizer - With Vitamin E & Jojoba Oil, For Face, Hand & Body, Instant Hydration, Non-greasy Cream (Gender - Male) by BPC Store
descriptor.short_desc: NIVEA Soft is a highly effective intensive moisturizing cream that leaves your skin feeling soft and supple.  Formulated with nourishing Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil, NIVEA Soft is soft, light and quickly absorbed to refresh and invigorate your skin. It is suitable for all skins types, dermatologically approved and can be used on the face, body and hands.  When you think of body care products, you may come up with lotions or other moisturizers. But the meaning of body care of far more extensive â€“ simply put, it refers to everything that delivers care for you, from head to toe. This includes body cleanser, deodorant, face care and hand care products, plus so much more. And this is where NIVEA expertise lies: in developing exceptional formulas made from the most effective and highest quality active ingredients to deliver the results you require, wherever you need the care
descriptor.long_desc: Whether you want to reduce wrinkles around your eyes, smooth rough hands or comfortably shave your legs, NIVEA has an answer to your need with a body care product within a wide-ranging portfolio. Because when your body feels well cared for, you will feel better in everything else that you do.  NIVEA, a hundred years of skincare for life! Composition Water, Myristyl Alcohol, Mineral Oil, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Stearic Acid, Petrolatum, Myristyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Dimethicone, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Jojoba), Tocopheryl Acetate, Polyglyceryl 2 Caprate, Phenoxyethanol, Lanolin Alcohol, Fragrance, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Cetyl Phosphate, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Propylparaben, Butylparaben, Isobutylparaben. Features   ENRICHED WITH: Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil to keep skin moisturized every day   FOR DAILY USE: nourishing and intensive moisturizing formula ideal to be used all over the face, hands and body How to Use
